template1.title: Vendor Creation email to Admin (Approval Off)

emailfields0.subject: New vendor "{{info.vendor_title}}" has registered on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear Admin,

A new vendor {{info.vendor_title}} has registered on the site by {{vendorer.name}}.
Click here to see all the vendors.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Hi Admin, New vendor {{info.vendor_title}} has registered on the site by {{vendorer.name}}.

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template2.title: Your vendor registration at "{{info.sitename}}" is complete

emailfields0.subject: Your vendor registration at "{{info.sitename}}" is complete
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{vendorer.name}},

Thank you for registering as a vendor, {{info.vendor_title}} is now published at {{info.sitename}}. You can edit your vendor information here.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Dear {{vendorer.name}}, Thank you for registering as a vendor, {{info.vendor_title}} is now published at {{info.sitename}}.

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template3.title: Vendor Creation email to Admin (approval On)

emailfields0.subject: Vendor "{{info.vendor_title}}" needs approval at {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear Admin,

A new vendor named {{info.vendor_title}} has registered on the site by {{vendorer.name}}. Click here to see all the vendors.
Note that you need to approve this vendor before they go live on the site.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}.

smsfields0.body: Dear Admin, A new vendor {{info.vendor_title}} has registered on the site by {{vendorer.name}}. Visit admin panel to approve this vendor on site.

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

template4.title: Vendor Creation email to Vendor Owner (approval On)

emailfields0.subject: Your vendor registration for "{{info.vendor_title}}" at {{info.sitename}} is pending for approval
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{vendorer.name}},

You have created a new vendor {{info.vendor_title}}. Your vendor profile is under going approval process. Once your administrator approves you can proceed further.
Please wait for approval email.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Dear {{vendorer.name}}, Your newly created vendor profile {{info.vendor_title}} is pending for approval. Wait for approval email to proceed further.

replacement_tags.name: info.allVendors
replacement_tags.description: Link to all vender view. (Admin user only)

emailfields0.subject: Your vendor registration for "{{vendor_data.vendor_title}}" at {{info.sitename}} has been approved!
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{vendor_user.name}},

Your vendor profile {{vendor_data.vendor_title}} has been approved by admin. Now you can further continue.

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Dear {{vendor_user.name}}, Your vendor profile {{vendor_data.vendor_title}} has been approved by admin. Now you can continue further.

template6.title: Edit Vendor profile mail to admin

emailfields0.subject: Vendor "{{info.vendor_title}}" has been edited on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear Admin,

The user {{vendorer.name}} has made changes to vendor {{info.vendor_title}}.

Vendor details are -
Vendor title - {{info.vendor_title}}
User - {{vendorer.name}}
Client - {{info.vendorClient}}

This is system generated email, please do not reply. Many thanks from {{info.sitename}}

smsfields0.body: Dear Admin, The user {{vendorer.name}} has made changes to vendor titled {{info.vendor_title}} client {{info.vendorClient}}
